errors.message: Network request failed (fetch error or timeout)
errors.remediation: Check network connectivity, verify VITE_SUPABASE_URL, inspect CORS config.
Verify Supabase edge function CORS headers include the requesting origin.
Check server health, increase timeout, verify endpoint availability.
Reduce request frequency, implement exponential backoff.
Check server logs, verify edge function deployment, check DB connectivity.
Re-authenticate, check token refresh logic, verify session TTL.
Verify AuthContext provides token, check supabase.auth.getSession().

errors.message: User lacks required role or permission
errors.remediation: Check admin role assignment, verify RLS policies.

errors.message: Signup failed (duplicate email, weak password, etc.)
errors.remediation: Check Supabase auth settings, verify email uniqueness, password policy.
Check action payload matches engine schema, verify game phase.

errors.message: Client and server game state diverged
errors.remediation: Force state refresh from server, check event ordering.

errors.message: Bot failed to produce an action (null return)
errors.remediation: Check enumerateLegalActions output, verify bot profile weights.

errors.message: Win condition met but gameOver not set
errors.remediation: Check checkWin and enforceWinFromCarrierPosition logic.
Check error boundary logs, verify prop types, look for null access.
Check component conditionals, verify test selectors match current markup.
Check for client-only code in SSR paths, avoid Date.now() in render.
Run scripts/test/setup-env.mjs, check .env file.
Check tsconfig paths, verify package is installed, check file extensions.
Run npx tsc --noEmit, fix type mismatches.

errors.message: Data does not match expected schema shape
errors.remediation: Check migration version, verify fixture factory matches current types.

errors.message: Received null/undefined where data was expected
errors.remediation: Check Supabase query, verify RLS allows access, check table exists.
Check client_feedback_id or other unique columns, handle duplicates.
